title: Logo: Blend Of America / Typeface: ?
content:
Dear Typophiles   
   
I'm looking for the typeface from which this logo has been created. Thanx in advance.   
   
Ps. Forgotten Futurist Bold Italic ( [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/forgotten-futurist/bold-italic/testdrive.html?s=BLEND+OF+AMERICA&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330010419/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/forgotten-futurist/bold-italic/testdrive.html?s=BLEND%2BOF%2BAMERICA&p=48)), as well as Eurostile Bold Italic comes close, but no cigar.   
   
   
 ![Blend Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330010419im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33766.jpg)
author: mezedge

comments.content:
Zoom...   
   
For a closer look.   
   
The A's got me puzzled...   
   
   
 ![Zoom](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330010419im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33778.jpg)

Well, I thought I had an idea, but Bolt Bold isn't quite right, even if you slant it 15 degrees.   
 ![Blend with Bolt](http://web.archive.org/web/20150330010419im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33792.gif)
